column2: "Mr. Umblla! Did you run into him? I'd love to see him once!"
"Rumors of having discovered Mr. Umblla are currently the hot topic here among the ARKS."
"From what I heard... \"It sounds like he appears before ARKS when they defeat Oodan then Gulf!\""
"ARKS who've encountered Mr. Umblla have all said they were fighting Oodan and Gulf just before!"
"I'm sorry for sending you to investigate rumors, but I want to verify them... Please, I'm begging you! Do as I ask!"
